name: Archfiend's Promotion
text:
[ Skill activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
[ Effect ]
Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control "Vilepawn Archfiend" and your opponent controls no card in the same column, you can Tribute it to Special Summon 1 Level 8 or lower "Archfiend" monster from your hand or Deck that has "Queen", "Bishop" , "Rook", or "Knight' in its name.
